topic.fullpath: Topic :: System :: Systems Administration :: Authentication/Directory :: LDAP

name: Qt Schema Editor
short_description: QSchmed is a GUI editor for LDAPV3 schema files. It is customisable for unique OID's and will suck the schema directly from the LDAPV3 server. Unlike other LDAP gui's out there, this one actually edit's the schema itself. It is *not* (yet) an LDAP browser
